dcterms:creator: Greg Brockman
Vicki Cheung
Ludwig Pettersson
Jonas Schneider
John Schulman
Jie Tang
Wojciech Zaremba
dcterms:description: In this environment, the agent learns to navigate from a start location to a goal in a frozen lake grid with holes in the ice. Each episode ends when the agent reaches the goal or falls through a hole in the ice.
dcterms:title: Frozen Lake 8 Ã— 8 environment

dcterms:creator: Thomas G Dietterich
dcterms:description: A chain of 11 states, where the agent starts at s0 and the episodes end when the agent enters s10. The agent receives a reward of r = 1 upon entering goal state s10 and incurs a cost for measuring the state.
dcterms:title: Chain environment

dcterms:creator: Thomas G Dietterich
dcterms:description: The agent learns to navigate a city grid world to pick up and drop off passengers at the appropriate location. The agent receives rewards for correct actions and incurs costs for measuring the state.
dcterms:title: Taxi environment

dcterms:description: This environment emulates a student learning to manipulate an energy source to produce a desired state change in a target material. The agent learns to adjust a heat source to transition the ratio of ice, liquid, gas.
dcterms:title: Junior Scientist environment
